question: Which of the following records of Bradman is not yet broken by Gavaskar?
option1: Total number of runs scored in Test matches
option2: Total number of centuries made in Test matches
option3: Total number of runs per inning
answer: Total number of runs per inning
explanation: The number of runs per innings Bradman scored was 99.6 and Gavasker scored runs per innings was 51.1.
